Tricks with Unix ... funny and use ful things it can do

  1. AIX sometimes gives an RMC error when you try to DLPAR. When that happens, do this on AIX
    sudo /usr/sbin/rsct/bin/rmcctrl -z
sleep 5
sudo /usr/sbin/rsct/bin/rmcctrl -A
sleep 5
sudo /usr/sbin/rsct/bin/rmcctrl -p
  2. If you have a corrupted block and you cannot copy, then you could potentially use this command to copy the file ignoring the errors
    sudo dd if=/directory/filename of=/directory/file2 bs=4096 conv=notrunc,noerror
  3. Use xargs.
    1. Unmount all filesystems on a system(AIX)
      lsvg -o | grep -v rootvg | xargs -n1 lsvgfs | sort -r | xargs -n1 sudo umount
  4. Use awk
    1. Print the second column in a comma ”,” delimited file
      awk -F"," '{print $2}' filename
  5. Use sed
    1. Print LPs of a LV from 0007 through 0014
      lslv -m fslv20 | sed -n "/^0007/,/^0014/"p
  6. How to eject a CDROM from Linux system and VSphere Client.
    1. First eject the cdrom from the linux system
      sudo eject /dev/cdrom

      Login to the the VSphere Client and then change the device to “Client Device” on VM
